title: How to Make a Sock Snowman (Kids)

steps.headline: Get a sock
steps.description: This sock is going to be the body of the snowman. Make sure it is an ankle sock that is plain white.

steps.headline: Fill it with cotton.
steps.description: Just enough to fill to the line of the sock.

steps.headline: Get 2 rubber bands
Get some markers
steps.description: You'll need these to draw the eyes, mouth, and buttons.

steps.headline: Create the hat
steps.description: Fold the sock line so that it looks like a knit hat.

steps.headline: Get 2 mini cotton puffs
steps.description:
Use the smallest one for the nose, and the biggest one for the hat ball. {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/0\/0b\/Make-a-Sock-Snowman-%28Kids%29-Step-6Bullet1.jpg\/v4-459px-Make-a-Sock-Snowman-%28Kids%29-Step-6Bullet1.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/0\/0b\/Make-a-Sock-Snowman-%28Kids%29-Step-6Bullet1.jpg\/v4-759px-Make-a-Sock-Snowman-%28Kids%29-Step-6Bullet1.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":306,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":506.31868131868134,"licensing":"

steps.headline: Get a thin ribbon
steps.description: Tie the ribbon around the snowman's neck into a bow to hide the rubber band.

steps.headline: Use hot glue
steps.description:
Glue the biggest ball the the center of the hat. {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/7\/74\/Make-a-Sock-Snowman-%28Kids%29-Step-8Bullet1.jpg\/v4-459px-Make-a-Sock-Snowman-%28Kids%29-Step-8Bullet1.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/7\/74\/Make-a-Sock-Snowman-%28Kids%29-Step-8Bullet1.jpg\/v4-759px-Make-a-Sock-Snowman-%28Kids%29-Step-8Bullet1.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":306,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":506.31868131868134,"licensing":"

text:
Get a sock This sock is going to be the body of the snowman. Make sure it is an ankle sock that is plain white. Fill it with cotton. Just enough to fill to the line of the sock. Get 2 rubber bands Use this rubber band to tie the line so none of the cotton falls out. {"smallUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/f/fa/Make-a-Sock-Snowman-%28Kids%29-Step-3Bullet1.jpg/v4-459px-Make-a-Sock-Snowman-%28Kids%29-Step-3Bullet1.jpg","bigUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/f/fa/Make-a-Sock-Snowman-%28Kids%29-Step-3Bullet1.jpg/v4-759px-Make-a-Sock-Snowman-%28Kids%29-Step-3Bullet1.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":306,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":506.31868131868134,"licensing":"

License: Creative Commons


"} Then use the second one to tie the head which should be at 3/4ths of the sock. {"smallUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/e/e1/Make-a-Sock-Snowman-%28Kids%29-Step-3Bullet2.jpg/v4-459px-Make-a-Sock-Snowman-%28Kids%29-Step-3Bullet2.jpg","bigUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/e/e1/Make-a-Sock-Snowman-%28Kids%29-Step-3Bullet2.jpg/v4-759px-Make-a-Sock-Snowman-%28Kids%29-Step-3Bullet2.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":306,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":506.31868131868134,"licensing":"

License: Creative Commons


"} Get some markers You'll need these to draw the eyes, mouth, and buttons. Create the hat Fold the sock line so that it looks like a knit hat. Get 2 mini cotton puffs Use the smallest one for the nose, and the biggest one for the hat ball. {"smallUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/0/0b/Make-a-Sock-Snowman-%28Kids%29-Step-6Bullet1.jpg/v4-459px-Make-a-Sock-Snowman-%28Kids%29-Step-6Bullet1.jpg","bigUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/0/0b/Make-a-Sock-Snowman-%28Kids%29-Step-6Bullet1.jpg/v4-759px-Make-a-Sock-Snowman-%28Kids%29-Step-6Bullet1.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":306,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":506.31868131868134,"licensing":"

License: Creative Commons


"} Get a thin ribbon Tie the ribbon around the snowman's neck into a bow to hide the rubber band. Use hot glue Glue the biggest ball the the center of the hat. {"smallUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/7/74/Make-a-Sock-Snowman-%28Kids%29-Step-8Bullet1.jpg/v4-459px-Make-a-Sock-Snowman-%28Kids%29-Step-8Bullet1.jpg","bigUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/7/74/Make-a-Sock-Snowman-%28Kids%29-Step-8Bullet1.jpg/v4-759px-Make-a-Sock-Snowman-%28Kids%29-Step-8Bullet1.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":306,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":506.31868131868134,"licensing":"

License: Creative Commons


"} Glue the smallest ball in the middle of the eyes. Let dry for 1 hour!
